meanings.sent1: I like to collect shiny tings.
meanings.sent2: She packed her favorite tings in a small box.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over all the tings on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with tings from his travels.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was full of glittering tings.

meanings.sent1: The tings of the wind chimes filled the garden.
meanings.sent2: I heard strange tings coming from the attic.
meanings.sent3: The tings of the piano keys echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: The tings of the metal bell signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The tings of the glass breaking startled everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: Informal term for things or objects
meanings.sent1: She always carries her favorite tings in her bag.
meanings.sent2: He found some interesting tings at the flea market.
meanings.sent3: The kids played with all sorts of colorful tings in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The shop sells all kinds of unique tings for decoration.
meanings.sent5: The box was full of random tings she had collected over the years.
